  • autoclean.mixins.signal_processing.reference.ReferenceMixin

autoclean.mixins.signal_processing.reference.ReferenceMixin#

class autoclean.mixins.signal_processing.reference.ReferenceMixin[source]#

Bases: object

Mixin class providing reference operations functionality for EEG data.

set_eeg_reference(data=None, ref_type='average', projection=False, stage_name='post_reference')[source]#

Apply EEG reference to the data.

Parameters:
dataOptional

The raw data to apply the reference to. If None, uses self.raw.

ref_typestr, Optional

The type of reference to apply (e.g., ‘average’).

projectionbool, Optional

Whether to use projection (for average reference).

stage_namestr, Optional

Name for saving and metadata, by default “post_reference”.

Returns:

inst : instance of mne.io.Raw The raw data object with reference applied

See also

mne.set_eeg_reference()

For MNE’s reference setting functionality
